Reviews.Title: dont waste your time and money!
Reviews.Author: Mandanicolew
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to receive this camera, it got to my house in a week or so.. i opened up the box and its not what i expected :/it almost looks like a kiddy play camera, its made cheaply and if your not 200% still the image is blurry beyond belief.I contacted the seller and they expected me to pay return shipping!! we qucickly got the fixed and they emailed me saying take my email to fedex and have it shipped. what a JOKE!dont waste your time or your money this camera is a J O K E!

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Mcglynn
Reviews.Content: I am giving this 2 stars instead of one because it does come with a lot of accessories.  Part from the that this camera should be sold in the children's toy section.  I can't imagine spending $8 on this let alone $80.  It came in the mail and I was incredibly disappointed on the quality of camera.  It felt and look quite frankly like a piece of junk.  The Fuji that I was replacing with this camera was waaayyy better at only 5 megapixel.  Don't be swayed this went back 2 days later.  I bought the Samsung DualView instead.

Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: girl 11
Reviews.Content: something must be wrong with this camera  cant see subject when taking the picture totally darkand pic comes out all blurry  have not been able to take a good picture  should try to get money back

Reviews.Title: Mid grade
Reviews.Author: Felicia J. King
Reviews.Content: This was not the camera I had hoped it would be but a good first camera for someone to take in their purse or backpack.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: lov
Reviews.Content: Bell and Howell 2V5-R 12 Megapixel 2view Digital Camera (Red)i really don't know how it works because i lost the charger to the camera but the one time i did use it. it work great

ProductInfo.Features:
1.5" Front LCD (self portrait) Display. 2.7" Back LCD Display, Automatic Face Detection, PictBridge enabled
12 Effect Modes, 10 Scene Modes. 3 Self -Timer Modes
Micro SD/HC card expandable up to 32GB
Slide Show/Built-in flash (3 modes), Programmed auto exposure and Voice & Memo Recording
Package also includes 2GB SD card, image editing software, li-ion battery, camera pouch, hand strap, instruction manual, power adapter and USB output cables
ProductInfo.Name: Bell and Howell 2V5-BL 12 Megapixel 2view Digital Camera (Blue)
